  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x112

    RenderBlock {div} at (0,16) size 800x80

          text run at (0,0) width 390: "This paragraph should have a green background because the "
          text run at (389,0) width 172: "enclosing div is in english."
